response.headline: Black-owned bakery in Nakano, Tokyo featured on social media with call to support Black businesses in Japan
response.summary: Kawaii Coco bakery located in Nakano, Tokyo is being promoted as part of a campaign to follow and support Black-owned businesses in Japan. The bakery appears to be featured among 8036 recent posts about this location.
